description:
P2PEscrow.transferMinusFees(address,uint256,uint256) (contracts/P2P.sol#238-247) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- (sent) = address(_to).call{value: (_value - _totalFees)}() (contracts/P2P.sol#245)
markdown:
[P2PEscrow.transferMinusFees(address,uint256,uint256)](contracts/P2P.sol#L238-L247) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- [(sent) = address(_to).call{value: (_value - _totalFees)}()](contracts/P2P.sol#L245)

description:
P2PEscrow.setFees(uint8) (contracts/P2P.sol#348-352) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- require(bool,string)(_fees < 10000,Fees must be greater than 10000) (contracts/P2P.sol#349)
markdown:
[P2PEscrow.setFees(uint8)](contracts/P2P.sol#L348-L352) contains a tautology or contradiction:
	- [require(bool,string)(_fees < 10000,Fees must be greater than 10000)](contracts/P2P.sol#L349)
